mapper.select: select pre_id,pre_name,address,longitude,latitude from t_ent_rent_user a LEFT JOIN v_prefecture b ON a.pre_id = b.id where start_time < NOW() and end_time > NOW() and user_id =#{0} GROUP BY pre_id

SELECT id as pre_id,name as pre_name,address,longitude,latitude,gateway,under_layer FROM v_prefecture WHERE id IN
${id}

SELECT pre_id, stall_id, stall_name, mobile, ent_id , ent_pre_id, pre_name, route_description, route_guidance, stall_local, status, lock_status, lock_sn, start_time, end_time, plate FROM ( SELECT c.pre_id, cs.stall_id, cs.stall_name, cu.plate, u.mobile, c.id as ent_id , c.pre_id as ent_pre_id, c.pre_name, p.route_description, p.route_guidance, s.stall_local, s.status, s.lock_status, s.lock_sn, DATE_FORMAT(c.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as start_time, DATE_FORMAT(c.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time FROM t_ent_rent_com c INNER JOIN t_ent_rent_com_stall cs ON c.id = cs.rent_com_id INNER JOIN v_stall s ON cs.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id and p.status = 0 INNER JOIN t_ent_rent_com_user cu ON c.id = cu.rent_com_id INNER JOIN v_vehicle_mark_manage m ON cu.plate = m.veh_mark INNER JOIN t_user u ON u.id = m.veh_user_id and u.id = #{0} WHERE u.id IS NOT NULL AND c.status = '2' AND NOW() between c.start_time AND c.end_time
UNION
SELECT ru.pre_id, ru.stall_id, ru.stall_name, ru.plate, tu.mobile, null as ent_id, p.id as ent_pre_id, ru.pre_name, p.route_description, p.route_guidance, s.stall_local, s.status, s.lock_status, s.lock_sn, DATE_FORMAT(ru.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as start_time, DATE_FORMAT(ru.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time FROM v_vehicle_mark_manage vm INNER JOIN t_ent_rent_user ru on vm.veh_mark =ru.plate and ru.type =0 INNER JOIN v_stall s ON ru.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id and p.status = 0 INNER JOIN t_user tu on tu.id = vm.veh_user_id and tu.id= #{0} WHERE NOW() BETWEEN ru.start_time and ru.end_time UNION
SELECT ru.pre_id, ru.stall_id, ru.stall_name, ru.plate, tu.mobile, null as ent_id, p.id as ent_pre_id, ru.pre_name, p.route_description, p.route_guidance, s.stall_local, s.status, s.lock_status, s.lock_sn, DATE_FORMAT(ru.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as start_time, DATE_FORMAT(ru.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time FROM v_vehicle_mark_manage vm INNER JOIN t_ent_rent_user ru on vm.veh_mark =ru.plate and ru.type =1 INNER JOIN v_stall s ON ru.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id and p.status = 0 INNER JOIN t_user tu on tu.id = vm.veh_user_id and tu.id= #{0} WHERE ru.company_id is null and now() BETWEEN ru.start_time and ru.end_time ) t GROUP BY pre_id, stall_id, stall_name, mobile, ent_id , ent_pre_id, pre_name, route_description, route_guidance, stall_local, status, lock_status, lock_sn, start_time, end_time, plate

SELECT '1' as stall_type, p.id AS pre_id, s.id AS stall_id, s.stall_name, fp.plate_no AS plate, u.mobile, p. NAME AS pre_name, p.route_description, p.route_guidance, s.stall_local, s. STATUS, s.lock_status, s.lock_sn, s.rent_om_type, s.rent_mo_type, DATE_FORMAT( fr.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, DATE_FORMAT( fr.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time FROM v_vehicle_mark_manage vm INNER JOIN t_fixed_plate fp ON vm.veh_mark = fp.plate_no INNER JOIN t_fixed_stall fs ON fs.fixed_id = fp.fixed_id AND `status` = 1 INNER JOIN v_stall s ON fs.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id AND p. STATUS = 0 INNER JOIN t_user u ON u.id = vm.veh_user_id INNER JOIN t_fixed_rent fr ON fr.id = fs.fixed_id LEFT JOIN t_fixed_disable fd ON fp.fixed_id = fd.fixed_id AND vm.veh_user_id = fd.user_id WHERE NOW() BETWEEN fr.start_time AND fr.end_time AND fd.id IS NULL AND u.id = #{0} GROUP BY pre_id, stall_id, stall_name, mobile, pre_name, route_description, route_guidance, stall_local, STATUS, lock_status, lock_sn, s.rent_om_type, s.rent_mo_type, start_time, end_time, plate UNION SELECT '2' as stall_type, p.id AS pre_id, s.id AS stall_id, s.stall_name, '' AS plate, u.mobile, p. NAME AS pre_name, p.route_description, p.route_guidance, s.stall_local, s. STATUS, s.lock_status, s.lock_sn, s.rent_om_type, s.rent_mo_type, DATE_FORMAT( t.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, DATE_FORMAT( t.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time FROM t_auth_record t INNER JOIN v_stall s ON t.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id AND p.STATUS = 0 INNER JOIN t_user u ON u.mobile= t.mobile where NOW() BETWEEN t.start_time AND t.end_time and t.switch_flag = 1 and t.auth_flag = 0 AND t.user_id = #{0}

SELECT owner_stall.* FROM ( SELECT p.id AS pre_id, s.id AS stall_id, s.stall_name, fp.plate_no AS plate, u.mobile, p. NAME AS pre_name, p.route_description, p.route_guidance, s.stall_local, s. STATUS, s.lock_status, s.lock_sn, s.rent_om_type, s.rent_mo_type, DATE_FORMAT( fr.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, DATE_FORMAT( fr.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time FROM v_vehicle_mark_manage vm INNER JOIN t_fixed_plate fp ON vm.veh_mark = fp.plate_no INNER JOIN t_fixed_stall fs ON fs.fixed_id = fp.fixed_id AND `status` = 1 INNER JOIN v_stall s ON fs.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id AND p. STATUS = 0 INNER JOIN t_user u ON u.id = vm.veh_user_id INNER JOIN t_fixed_rent fr ON fr.id = fs.fixed_id LEFT JOIN t_fixed_disable fd ON fp.fixed_id = fd.fixed_id AND vm.veh_user_id = fd.user_id WHERE NOW() BETWEEN fr.start_time AND fr.end_time AND fd.id IS NULL AND u.id = #{0} GROUP BY pre_id, stall_id, stall_name, mobile, pre_name, route_description, route_guidance, stall_local, STATUS, lock_status, lock_sn, s.rent_om_type, s.rent_mo_type, start_time, end_time, plate ) owner_stall LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.stall_name, s.id, count(*) AS cnt FROM t_fixed_stall fs INNER JOIN v_stall s ON fs.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN t_fixed_plate fp ON fs.fixed_id = fp.fixed_id INNER JOIN t_fixed_rent fr ON fs.fixed_id = fr.id INNER JOIN v_vehicle_mark_manage vm ON fp.plate_no = vm.veh_mark INNER JOIN t_user u ON vm.veh_user_id = u.id WHERE u.id IS NOT NULL AND NOW() BETWEEN fr.start_time AND fr.end_time AND fs.`status` = 1 AND s.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT s.id FROM v_vehicle_mark_manage vm INNER JOIN t_fixed_plate fp ON vm.veh_mark = fp.plate_no INNER JOIN t_fixed_stall fs ON fs.fixed_id = fp.fixed_id AND `status` = 1 INNER JOIN v_stall s ON fs.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id AND p. STATUS = 0 INNER JOIN t_user u ON u.id = vm.veh_user_id INNER JOIN t_fixed_rent fr ON fr.id = fs.fixed_id LEFT JOIN t_fixed_disable fd ON fp.fixed_id = fd.fixed_id AND vm.veh_user_id = fd.user_id WHERE NOW() BETWEEN fr.start_time AND fr.end_time AND fd.id IS NULL AND u.id = #{0} ) GROUP BY s.stall_name, s.id ORDER BY cnt DESC ) stall_user ON owner_stall.stall_id = stall_user.id WHERE stall_user.cnt = 1
